description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'LeaderboardScreen' that builds a UI screen displaying a leaderboard list with styling, avatar icons, and a list of player rankings.

classes.name: LeaderboardScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a leaderboard UI with a top bar, navigation drawer, and list of player rankings.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the leaderboard screen, including a scaffold with app bar, drawer, and a list view of leaderboard entries.
